subject: Re: [junit] Thick CLient Testing using Junit
msgSnippet: ... JUnit can test anything written in Java or that has a Java client. As for how to do it /well/, can you run your think client and simulate the server it
messageBody:
Feby wrote:

> Is there a mechanism using JUnit to efficiently test Thick client
> features using JUnit?

JUnit can test anything written in Java or that has a Java client. As
for how to do it /well/, can you run your think client and simulate the
server it uses? If so, you can test it pretty well with JUnit!
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
